title: Special characters for CTC
body:
Hello everyone,
First of all, thanks for your sharing and your great job.
I've been trying to implement StarNet in C++ with the libtorch C++ API. After a while I could not managed how to use the Attention_sensitive_characters network correctly. 
All characters are usually read, but repeated characters appears quite often, without clear explanation.
After few investigations, I think this is due to an internal libtorch issue on the Attention part.
Indeed, the results are great with the CTC version of your network, and I think i've missed nothing trying to translate your Attention_converter from Python to C++.
Furthermore, CTC version is a bit faster, and this is more convenient.

I'm now trying to move to a special character sensitive version (include non alpha-numeric characters) of the CTC. Have you already done the pretrained models for such a network ? The only special characters sensitive model i've found is for Attention.

If not, I'll make my own learning.

Thanks again for your sharing,
